articles.title: C.C., DFRK Sends Appeal to Compatriots in South
articles.content:
C.C., DFRK Sends Appeal to Compatriots in South 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea issued an appeal to the compatriots of the south on Sunday, the 96th anniversary of the March 1 Popular Uprising.
					 The appeal said that the uprising was a nation-wide anti-Japanese patriotic resistance as Koreans courageously turned out in the struggle of justice to win back the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country after it was deprived of its sovereignty by the Japanese imperialists' brutal occupation. 
					
					 Through the heroic March 1 Popular Uprising, the Korean nation demonstrated before the whole world that it was the nation strong in independence with indomitable stamina and ardent patriotic spirit of braving any sacrifice to win back the sovereignty of the country, the appeal said, adding:
					
					  But the gangster-like U.S. imperialists, which had landed in south Korea, partitioned the land of golden tapestry into two parts, though the Korean nation was delighted at the liberation of the country and rejoiced over the building of an independent and sovereign state. 
					
					 Violation of sovereignty by foreign forces and pain caused by national division should neither be tolerated nor be allowed, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. persistent domination and intervention in south Korea are the root cause of all misfortunes and pain suffered by the Korean nation and a basic stumbling block in the way of achieving the nation's sovereignty and reunification.
					
					 The U.S. is neither "liberator" and "helper" nor "guardian".
					
					 Today the north-south relations are inching close to the extreme confrontation and the dark clouds of a nuclear war hang heavily over the Korean peninsula. This is also a product of the U.S. long-term presence and domination over south Korea and its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should resolutely drop their shameful sycophancy and treachery and get rid of the U.S. control, clearly aware that their persistent act of keeping to the path of confrontation and war in collusion with outsiders with their backs on the nation will bring destruction only.
					
					 The appeal said that the final victory of the just sacred war of the Korean nation against the U.S. and the cause of Korea's reunification are certain to be achieved as long as there are the great leadership firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation, the invincible Songun banner and the great programmes for national reunification indicating the way ahead of the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Organizations of North and South of Korea Issue Joint Appeal
articles.content:
Organizations of North and South of Korea Issue Joint Appeal
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation of the north side and the preparatory committee for joint national events of the March 1 anniversary and the Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation of the south side issued a north-south joint appeal to mark the 96th anniversary of the March 1 Popular Uprising on Sunday.
					 The uprising, which dedicated one page to Korea's history of the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle, was a historic event that fully demonstrated the strong independent spirit, indomitable stamina and ardent patriotism of the Korean people who did not tolerate outside forces' domination and oppressive rule but protested against them, risking death, and shook down to the roots the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 The appeal stressed the need to conduct the dynamic struggle to terminate outside forces' interference in internal affairs, preserve peace and withdraw foreign forces from this land by the united efforts of the entire nation.
					
					 It called upon all the Koreans to pool efforts and conduct the nation-wide movement for resolutely opposing and rejecting the joint military drills with outside forces, foiling the revival of Japanese militarism and forcing Japan to make apology and reparation for the Japanese imperialists' past shuddering crimes. 
					
					 It called for achieving the great unity of the nation in the idea of By Our Nation Itself and successfully solving the issue of the country's reunification in the interests common to the nation.
					
					 It called upon all the Koreans to thoroughly preserve the July 4 joint statement, the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and conduct a dynamic nation-wide movement to put the declarations into practice.
					
					 It called on all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to bring about a great turn and change in the inter-Korean relations and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification with one will and purpose.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Calls for Reform of UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Calls for Reform of UNSC
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate addressed an open seminar of the UNSC on ensuring global peace and security on Feb. 23.
					 He referred to the fact that the UN assigned the UNSC the primary responsibility for ensuring global peace and security but its activities have been quite contrary to the principles stipulated in the UN Charter.
					
					 He said that a specified permanent member state of the UNSC tries to act like the world MP through military alliance or mutual military alliance which has nothing to do with the UN or, on some occasions, by abusing the UNSC. This is the present reality, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Highhanded and arbitrary practices by a specified permanent member state at the UNSC find their most vivid manifestation in the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Discussion on the Korean issue at the UNSC is not oriented to ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula but serves the U.S. strategic goal to violate the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the policy of the U.S. administration to stamp out the idea, social system and sovereignty of the DPRK by tapping all leverages such as "nukes", "human rights", "cyber attack" and "freedom of expression."
					
					 The UNSC should be prevented from being reduced to the tool of the highhanded and arbitrary practices.
					
					 So, it is necessary to promptly reform the UNSC in all aspects.
					
					 The U.S. should drop unilateral hostile policy toward the UN member nations and sovereign states at once and stop abusing the UNSC for attaining its unreasonable purposes.
					
					 If the UNSC is to show it is sincere and serious in its stand and attitude to the issue of global peace and security, it has to take up for discussion issues such as U.S. war exercises aimed to bring down sovereign states and harsh torture by the CIA targeting the whole world.

articles.title: Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
articles.content:
Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
						
 Hyesan, March 1 (KCNA) -- Senior officials in charge of administrative affairs across the country started their study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 A starting ceremony took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province Sunday.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute.
					
					 At the historic land where the Battle of Pochonbo was organized by him, they made a bow to his statue in humble reverence.
					
					 Being briefed on the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, they went round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, post office, sub-county office, fire station, the then police post of the Japanese imperialists, etc.
					
					 That day they looked round the Spring Site in Poso-ri and the proposition monument in the Tableland of Junghung which are associated with the revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il who firmly defended and glorified the purity of the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu. They headed for the secret camp on Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Papers Call for Destroying Outside Forces' Aggression Moves and Preserving Sovereignty of Nation
articles.content:
Papers Call for Destroying Outside Forces' Aggression Moves and Preserving Sovereignty of Nation 
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Papers Sunday dedicate editorials to mark the 96th anniversary of the March 1 Popular Uprising. The editorials call on all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to give full play to their strong spirit of independence and unity against outside forces and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year.
					 The uprising that left a shining page in Korea's history of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement was a nation-wide anti-Japanese patriotic resistance to win back the sovereignty of the country that was usurped by the gangster-like Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says the uprising taught a bitter lesson that if the people are to win a victory in the struggle for achieving the sovereignty of the nation and the independence of the country, they have to be led by an outstanding leader and that they have to launch an organized struggle to defeat the aggressors armed to the teeth by building the powerful military capabilities of the nation itself.
					
					 The ardent desire of the Korean nation for the country's liberation and independence was successfully realized by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 The cause of national independence pioneered and led by them has greeted a new historic turn thanks to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since the uprising but the Korean nation has not yet established the sovereignty on a nationwide scale.
					
					 All the Koreans should kindle the flame of the struggle for independence against outsiders.
					
					 We, keeping in our mind the historical lesson of the uprising, will bolster up the war deterrence for self-defence under the uplifted banner of Songun despite the U.S. and its followers' recklessly hostile acts against the DPRK aimed to do harm to its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 If the enemies ignite a war of aggression, we will give fullest play to the inexhaustible military capabilities in order to achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification without fail.
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad should get firmly united in the idea of By Our Nation Itself under the banner of patriotism and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses the need for the entire nation to resolutely reject the outside aggression forces standing in the way of the country's reunification by its united efforts in order to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year marking the 70th anniversaries of the country's liberation and national division.

articles.title: Korean People Cherish Firm Faith in Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean People Cherish Firm Faith in Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il made public his work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), helping service personnel and other people realize the essential advantages of socialism and cherish faith in socialism.
					 The work says the wicked propaganda conducted by the imperialists and the renegades of revolution by taking advantage of the tragic collapse of socialism in different countries was sheer sophism, and indicates important problems arising in defending the cause of socialism.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday says in an article:
					
					 The last over 20 years were shining decades when the Korean people fully demonstrated their fixed faith in Korean-style socialism that has become part of their life.
					
					 The Korean people's steadfast faith in socialism is being fully displayed in safeguarding the ideological position of socialism, winning victory after victory in the showdown with the U.S. and firmly defending socialism.
					
					 The service personnel and other people of the DPRK have sky-high spirit to bring the imperialists their final doom by striking them with unprecedented terror and shudder and inflicting a bitter defeat upon them.
					
					 It is a manifestation of the absolute belief in final victory that all people are bringing about victory in all fields of building a thriving nation with one mind and will.
					
					 Firm is the determination of the Korean people to build a socialist paradise of our own style with our own strength, technology and resources.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Past Crimes Can Never Be Covered up: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Past Crimes Can Never Be Covered up: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Koreans and other people of the world will follow the attitude of Japan to the history of its past crimes and certainly settle accounts with it, says Rodong Sinmun on Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Through the March 1 Popular Uprising in 1919 the world came to know that the Japanese imperialists committed hideous unethical crimes against the Korean nation, crimes so thrice-cursed that can hardly be settled despite the lapse of centuries.
					
					 The Japanese imperialist murderers quenched the uprising by brandishing such lethal weapons as sword, axe and bamboo spear.
					
					 Saying it is not "interesting" just to shoot and it is regrettable to use sword, they fastened limbs of Koreans to four cows or horses to dismember them to death and hung their necks and limbs from trees after cutting them with straw-cutter.
					
					 According to data available, more than 100 000 Koreans were mercilessly killed by the Japanese imperialists with the uprising as an occasion.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists walked away or abducted millions of Koreans during their occupation of Korea, used them as cannon fodder at battle-sites,  hurled them into slave labor sites like beasts of burden, mercilessly killing more than one million of Koreans and forcing at least 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery.
					
					 Japan is persistently resorting to despicable and brazen-faced act of tampering with history, far from feeling guilty conscience.
					
					 This can be interpreted that the brutality, the samurai nature and moral vulgarity of the murderers who massacred the Koreans during their occupation of Korea have been handed down to their descendents.
					
					 Though Japan makes desperate efforts to evade the responsibility for the past crimes, it can never deny truth and justice of history.

articles.title: Shutdown of Jaju Minbo Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Shutdown of Jaju Minbo Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The All-people measure committee for checking the shutdown of Jaju Minbo that consists of members of the south Korean public organizations and overseas compatriots held a press interview outside the puppet Supreme Court on Feb. 25 and made public a statement condemning the authorities' suppression of the progressive paper.
					 The statement said it was an intentional and politically-motivated provocation that the authorities got more undisguised in suppressing the progressive force and reunification activists and made a decision on the shutdown.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime and the "Saenuri Party" are the dictatorial forces that have to be done away with as they intentionally and forcibly shut down Jaju Minbo working for peace and national reunification, increasing the danger of war in collusion with foreign forces, the statement denounced.
					
					 No suppression and hardship can cover up justice and truth, the statement noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service's Act Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service's Act Flayed
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Heinous politically-motivated operation by Intelligence Service is brought back to light again" was posted on Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on Feb. 26.
					 It was disclosed that in the early period when Lee Myung Bak took office, the Intelligence Service falsified data on investigation into Roh Moo Hyun, former "president", and had them be reported in a bid to hurt him, the editorial said.
					
					 This fact is shocking because the Intelligence Service drove the former "president" to death through base conspiratorial method by making up a story, it charged, and went on:
					
					 What the IS did is unpardonable as it faked up false facts and caused the tragic death of the former "president". The truth about the case should be probed thoroughly and those concerned be charged.
					
					 Won Se Hun, the then director of the Intelligence Service, should be called to account.

articles.title: Demo in S. Korea Demands Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Demo in S. Korea Demands Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The bereaved families of Ferry Sewol disaster and members of civic organizations of south Korea launched a demo demanding a probe into the truth behind the disaster in Inchon City on February 25, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They affirmed that they would find missing persons by salvaging the ferry to thoroughly probe the truth.

articles.title: S. Koreans in Japan Protest Joint Military Exercises against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Koreans in Japan Protest Joint Military Exercises against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- South Koreans in Japan staged a protest demanding a halt to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities targeted against the DPRK on Feb. 23. They included the Alliance of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification, the South Korean Youth League in Japan, the South Korean Democratic Women's Society in Japan, the Consultative Council of South Korean Students in Japan.
					 A written request addressed to the U.S. President was read out.
					
					 The request said that the joint military exercises projected from coming March is barbarous and offensive large-scale drills simulating a nuclear war of aggression against the north, adding the tension on the Korean peninsula runs so high that touch-and-go situation is becoming a reality.
					
					 It demanded a stop to the U.S.-south Korea joint war drills which will escalate confrontation and bring destruction.
					
					 Then the organizations moved to the south Korean embassy in Tokyo where they demanded the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime which resorts to corruption and irregularities and revives the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 In a written protest they denounced the south Korean regime for its traitorous and anti-reunification act of serving the U.S. by denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and scuttling the north-south relations.
					
					 On Feb. 21, they conducted information activities in Tokyo demanding the stop to the aggression war moves and the resignation of the regime.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Accuse S. Korean Forces of Forcibly Shutting down Progressive Paper
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Accuse S. Korean Forces of Forcibly Shutting down Progressive Paper
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Feb. 24 made public a statement denouncing the south Korean puppet group for forcibly banning Jaju Minbo,  a progressive paper.
					 Such violence proves once again the south Korean society is a lawless land, the statement said.
					
					 Terming it an act of treachery dampening the desire of Koreans for peaceful reunification, the statement added:
					
					 Jaju Minbo has conducted its activities in the spirit of the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration for reunification, the desire of the nation, since its foundation.
					
					 The statement warned that those involved in such moves will be made to pay a dear price for their crimes before the nation for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, lectures and film shows were held in Peru, Syria, Indonesia, Uganda and Tunisia between Feb. 9 and 19 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The president of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) said it was a great encouragement to the world progressive people that the Korean people firmly defended socialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Revolutionary Youth Union of Syria, who doubles as a member of the People's Assembly in Syria, praised Kim Jong Il as a great man who performed undying exploits for the cause of human independence and a prominent leader who turned the DPRK into an invincible power, carrying forward the idea and will of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The chief of the export section of an Indonesian company lauded Kim Jong Il as the great leader and the father of the people who developed the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power and ensured peace and security of the Asian region.
					
					 The chairman of the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association noted the exploits Kim Jong Il performed for developing the DPRK into an invincible country under the banner of Songun would shine forever.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked by Russian Media
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked by Russian Media
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Russian media carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The paper Veteran No. 6 carried an article titled "Defender of independence" accompanied with photos documenting revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un and a picture of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 soaring to space.
					
					 What merits special attention is that the time has gone never to return when the U.S. threatened the DPRK with nukes, the paper said, adding the powerful war deterrent of the DPRK reliably guarantees peace and security not only in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia but the rest of the world.
					
					 The paper Nizhegorodskaya Pravda on Feb. 12 dedicated one whole page to articles titled "Great man of history" and "Korea does what it is determined to do" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It praised Kim Jong Un for translating into reality the dream and ideal of the people by carrying forward the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and the cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of Russian Federation posted on its website on Feb. 14 an article praising Kim Jong Il for laying a solid foundation for the prosperity of the country and people's happiness by dedicating his all, illustrated with his photo.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked across World
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked across World
						
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was celebrated with splendor by the people on the five continents. 
					 Brisk preparations were made to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star significantly from the outset of the year under the sponsorship of governments, political parties and public organizations in many countries.
					
					 Following the formation of national preparatory committees for celebration of his 73rd birth anniversary in Abuja, Nigeria and Cotonou, Benin on Jan. 9, similar preparatory committees were organized in more than 50 countries and regions including Russia, Mongolia, India, Thailand, Malaysia, Norway, UK and Germany.
					
					 Especially in Russia, nine preparatory committees were inaugurated one after another in different regions including Moscow, Khabarovsk Territory, Maritime Territory and Ulyanovsk Region.
					
					 Meetings, seminars, lectures, round-table talks, photo and book exhibitions, film shows and other colorful events took place in more than 100 countries and regions under the sponsorship of the preparatory committees, governments, political parties and organizations.
					
					 Those events held across the world praised his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 Foreign media gave wide publicity to the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who laid eternal foundation for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation and people's happiness and made great contributions to the cause of human independence.
